scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-geo:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-geo-warp.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-geo-warp.js -c -m -o build/d3-geo-warp.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-geo-warp.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-geo-warp.js build/d3-geo-warp.min.js
